extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.1.6 - Aug. 14, 2021[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed [B]"Boxing"[/B] and [B]"Based on a True Story"[/B] lists stopped showing in [B]"Discover Movies"[/B] - [B]"Collections"[/B].[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Trakt [B]"Watchlist"[/B] and [B]"Collections"[/B] for Movies and TVShows can now be paginated. There is a new setting added in the Trakt category and is enabled by default. To achieve this the data fetched from Trakt is now part of a new service sync and pagination occurs locally.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] [B]"My Movies"[/B] and [B]"My TV Shows"[/B] now has it's own [B]"My Liked Lists"[/B] category to better group the list data. These liked lists will no longer appear jumbled into [B]"Movie Lists"[/B] or [B]"TV Show Lists"[/B].[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] The Trakt sync database has been expanded to cover users [B]hiddenProgress[/B], [B]liked_lists[/B], [B]movies_collections[/B], [B]movie_watchlist[/B], [B]shows_collections[/B], [B]shows_watchlist[/B]. This helps in speeding up the load time of lists utilizing this data and is currently still being developed.[/I]
